ModulePrefs.title: 2008 Campaign Trail
ModulePrefs.description: View live election results for the 2008 primaries.
ModulePrefs.author: Michael Geary

Module.Content:
<script src="http://maps.google.com/maps?file=api&v=2&key=ABQIAAAAL7MXzZBubnPtVtBszDCxeRTZqGWfQErE9pT-IucjscazSdFnjBSzjqfxm1CQj7RDgG-OoyNfebJK0w" type="text/javascript">
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	GoogleElectionMapOptions = {
		gadget: true,
		_: null
	};
	
	function script( url, seconds ) {
		document.write(
			'<script type="text/javascript" src="',
				_IG_GetCachedUrl( url, { refreshInterval:seconds } ),
			'">',
			'<\/script>'
		);
	}
	
	script( 'http://primary-maps-2008.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/jquery-1.2.3-no-ajax.min.js', 3600 );
	script( 'http://primary-maps-2008.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/campaign-trail.js', 120 );
</script>
